item.title: 20 years after Katrina, NatGeo and New Orleans remember
item.description: 20 years ago, Ivor Van Heerden warned of impending disaster in New Orleans. Are his warnings still going unheeded?

item.title: A new Martian climate model suggest a mostly cold, harsh environment
item.description: A model built using data from the Curiosity rover suggests wet periods were rare.
